name: Glider Flight Simulator
description:
Get ready to challenge your piloting skills in this realistic glider flight sim. How long can you stay airborne? How high can you reach? Fly both historical and modern gliders across 6 amazing landscapes. Offers both joystick and tilt controls with adjustable sensitivity. Realistic flight simulation that's 100% FREE!

Never before has flying been so realistic & fun on mobile! Enjoy the challenge of staying in flight using updrafts and the amazing gliders in this free mobile flight sim. Featuring music by http://MatthewPablo.com

HOW TO PLAY:

Fly as far and high as you can! Use the Updrafts around the level to regain altitude and speed. The on screen joystick, or tilt controls(switch in Options or the Pause menu), to control the aircraft. On screen buttons can be tapped to control throttle, gear, brake, camera, and camera reset. You can reset your airplane in the pause menu.

FEATURES:

*Realistic flight sim for mobile!

*Working controls, flaps, and surfaces!

*2 unpowered modern and classical gliders, fly though history!

*4 Cameras to choose from(cockpit, orbit, dynamic, tower).

*6 beautiful landscapes to fly across and explore.
